22 This class provides all functionality needed for loading images, style sheets and html
23 pages from the web. It has a memory cache for these objects.
24*/
25
26#pragma once
27
28#include "CachedResource.h"
29
30namespace WebCore {
31
32class TextResourceDecoder;
33
34class CachedScript final : public CachedResource {
35public:
36 CachedScript(CachedResourceRequest&&, PAL::SessionID, const CookieJar*);
37 virtual ~CachedScript();
38
39 StringView script();
40 unsigned scriptHash();
41
42private:
43 bool mayTryReplaceEncodedData() const final { return true; }
44
45 bool shouldIgnoreHTTPStatusCodeErrors() const final;
46
47 void setEncoding(const String&) final;
48 String encoding() const final;
49 const TextResourceDecoder* textResourceDecoder() const final { return m_decoder.get(); }
50 void finishLoading(SharedBuffer*, const NetworkLoadMetrics&) final;
51
52 void destroyDecodedData() final;
53
54 void setBodyDataFrom(const CachedResource&) final;
55
56 String m_script;
57 unsigned m_scriptHash { 0 };
58
59 enum DecodingState { NeverDecoded, DataAndDecodedStringHaveSameBytes, DataAndDecodedStringHaveDifferentBytes };
60 DecodingState m_decodingState { NeverDecoded };
61
62 RefPtr<TextResourceDecoder> m_decoder;
63};
64
65} // namespace WebCore
66
67SPECIALIZE_TYPE_TRAITS_CACHED_RESOURCE(CachedScript, CachedResource::Type::Script)
68
